item.name: KIVSTA
item.description:
Frame: Steel, Pigmented powder coating
Shade: Polystyrene, 100 % cotton

item.name: KARLSTAD
item.description:
Frame: Particleboard, Plywood, Fiberboard
Zig-zag spring: Steel
Armrest frame: Polyester wadding, Polyurethane foam 1.2 lb/cu.ft., Polyurethane foam 2.0 lb/cu.ft.
Seat cushion: Polyester wadding, High-resilience polyurethane foam (cold foam) 2.5 lb/cu.ft.
Back cushion: Polyester fiber fill, Polyurethane foam 1.2 lb/cu.ft.
Leg: Solid birch
Lining: Non-woven polypropylene
Total composition: 100 % cotton

item.name: STEFAN
item.description: Solid pine, Stain, Clear acrylic lacquer
